asap.realizer

Class DefaultEngine<T extends TimedPlanUnit>

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.realizer.DefaultEngine<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of TimedPlanUnit handled by the Engine
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Engine

    public class DefaultEngine<T extends TimedPlanUnit>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Engine
    Default implementation of the Engine Interface
    Author:
    Herwin van Welbergen

      • DefaultEngine

        public DefaultEngine(Planner<T> planner,
                     Player player,

      • DefaultEngine

        public DefaultEngine(Planner<T> planner,
                     Player player,
                     PlanManager<T> planManager,
                     boolean verifyNoPlay)
        Parameters:
        verifyNoPlay - if set, the engine should not call player.play(time), but rather player.verifyTime(time), because the player is already being "played" from somewhere else.

      • addBehaviour

        public java.util.List<SyncAndTimePeg> addBehaviour(BMLBlockPeg bbPeg,
                                                   saiba.bml.core.Behaviour b,
                                                   java.util.List<TimePegAndConstraint> sac,
                                                   TimedPlanUnit planElement)
                                            throws BehaviourPlanningException
        Description copied from interface: Engine
        Adds a behavior to the plan. All timepegs in sac must be resolved.
        Specified by:
        addBehaviour in interface Engine
        planElement - planElement obtained from resolveSynchs, null to create a new planElement
        Returns:
        a list of all syncs of the behavior and their linked TimePegs
        Throws:
        BehaviourPlanningException - if no behavior satisfying sac can be constructed

      • resolveSynchs

        public T resolveSynchs(BMLBlockPeg bbPeg,
                       saiba.bml.core.Behaviour b,
                       java.util.List<TimePegAndConstraint> sac)
                throws BehaviourPlanningException
        Description copied from interface: Engine
        Resolves TimePegs for behavior b, given some known time pegs and constraints
        Specified by:
        resolveSynchs in interface Engine
        b - the behavior
        sac - the provided time pegs and constraints, missing constraints are filled out by this method
        Returns:
        the object to be placed in the plan (a TimedMotionUnit, SpeechUnit, ...)
        Throws:
        BehaviourPlanningException - if no behavior satisfying sac can be constructed

      • createOffsetPeg

        public OffsetPeg createOffsetPeg(java.lang.String bmlId,
                                 java.lang.String behId,
                                 java.lang.String syncId)
                          throws BehaviorNotFoundException,
                                 SyncPointNotFoundException,
                                 TimePegAlreadySetException
        Description copied from interface: Engine
        Creates an offsetpeg for bmlId:behId:syncId, this peg is linked to the TimePeg in this behaviour
        Specified by:
        createOffsetPeg in interface Engine
        Throws:
        BehaviorNotFoundException - bmlId:behId does not exist
        SyncPointNotFoundException - syncId is not valid
        TimePegAlreadySetException - bmlId:behId:syncId is already linked to a TimePeg
